name: Quasit Familiar
description: A tiny fiend with dark features, exceptional agility, and the ability to shift into various forms such as a bat or toad.
memorable: Its magic resistance and telepathic bond with its master significantly enhance its utility as a familiar.
goals: To serve spellcasters and carry out subtle tasks that require stealth and magical assistance.
relations: Often found serving spellcasters or other creatures possessing dark magic.
environment: Dark and secluded areas, often accompanying its master on magical endeavors.
strengths: Excellent stealth capabilities, magic resistance, and usefulness as a familiar.
weaknesses: Very low physical strength, making it ineffective in direct combat.
attacks: Uses sharp claws to deal piercing damage and can poison foes, or instill fear in nearby creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance grants it advantage on saving throws against spells.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to navigate easily in darkness.
skills: Skilled in stealth with a bonus of +5, enabling it to evade detection effectively.
additional_information: Can communicate telepathically with its master up to 1 mile away.
Can become invisible for stealthy maneuvers.
Resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage.
Can shapeshift into small creatures without changing its statistics.

invisible familiar with magic resistance abilities
chaotic evil creature with shapeshifting powers
cute tiny monster that can poison enemies
